author: andschwa
body: It's expecting   root  but getting   home build  which is an error in how the unit test itself is setup, I think.           Get Item ENV HOME .Value       Should be   root  ???  docker runs as root.  running standalone in dev box returns  home zafolw, matching results from build machine.  added tests and made changes.  awaiting approval   bin hostname DNE   use  usr bin env hostname instead  VSO create date - 8/7/2015 14:58:00     VSO closed date - 8/28/2015 15:07:00
title: Fix unit tests for Test-Environment-Variables.Tests.ps1
